page.title: 16LAW AND ORDER 2
page.content: EACH POLICE FORCE HAS AN ATTACHMENT OF SPECIAL CONSTABLES WHO VOLUNTEERS TO PERFORM POLICE DUTIES WITHOUT PAY IN THEIR SPARE TIME . IN SCOTLAND THEY ARE EMPLOYED ONLY IN EMERGENCIES ALTHOUGH THEY MAYBE ASIGNED TO DUTY FOR TRAVELLING PURPOSE .IN THE 19th CENTURY , WIVES OF CONSTABLES WERE RESPONSIBLE FOR LOOKING AFTER WOMEN WHO HAD BEEN BROUGHT INTO POLICE STATIONS BUT IT WAS NOT UNTIL THE FIRST WORLD WAR (1914-1918)THAT WOMEN ACTUALLY BECAME POLICE OFFICERS BY VOLUNTEERING TO TAKE PLACE OF MEN WHO WERE FIGHTING IN THE WAR . BY 1916 THERE WAS A SMALL NUMBER OF FULL TIME POLICE WOMAN IN ENGLAND AND WALES. THEIR NUMBERS GREW SLOWLY AND BY 1939 THERE WERE ONLY 226. BRORA HAS A RANGE ROVER, GOLSPIE A FORD ESCORT CAR AND HELMSDALE HAS A VAUXHALL ASTRA.
